about_the_game:
Being a worm is not easy in this side-scrolling adventure.
After having escaped from the fisherman’s bait can, you plummet down into the reef. There you must make your way out while traveling in a breathable air bubble. Avoid obstacles and explore each level with care since there are hidden items that are essential to get to freedom.



  • Old-school difficulty elements
  • Precision in-game movement to avoid hazards
  • Race against time
  • Follow hints to uncover secrets
  • Stunning 2D original illustrations
  • Classical animation
  • Fun for all ages!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Mono or Stereo
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Mono or Stereo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: AMD Athlon 64+ / Intel CPU's: Pentium 4+, Celeron+, Intel Pentium M+ & Celeron M+, Intel Atom+
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM / Intel® CPU's with HD Graphics core Gen. i3, i5, i7+ / Sempron X2+, Athlon II X2, A4+, FX+, Ryzen Gen.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Mono or Stereo
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Athlon 64+ / intel core 1st Gen. i3, i5, i7+, Xeon+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM / Nvidia GeForce series 8+, GT, GTS, GTX, MX, Ti, TITAN, RTX / ATI Radeon HD 2000+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: AMD High Definition Audio / Intel® HD Audio / NVIDIA High Definition Audio (HDA)

short_description: Travel the underwater dangers of the reef in a breathable air bubble. Test your reflexes as you avoid obstacles and carefully explore each stage to grab items essential for clearing each level.
